name: gplot
short_description:
gplot is a python an interface to directly plot scientific graphs using gnuplot. The API aims to be similar to matplotlib, to make it possible to port simple code easily between both modules.

Heighlights (planned):
  - Pure python, no compiled modules
  - The only prerequisites are gnuplot, python and numpy
  - Interactive plotting with any number of figures/graphs
  - Directly usable GUI widgets for QT4, GTK an WxWidgets
